messages.subject: Missouri :-)
messages.msgSnippet: Hey Julie in MO!!! I operate and own FIELD TRIPS!!! here in Missouri.  Email me at homeedfieldtrips@aol.com and I ll be glad to send you the upcoming FIELD
messages.messageBody:
Hey Julie in MO!!!

I operate and own FIELD TRIPS!!! here in Missouri. Email me at
homeedfieldtrips@... and I'll be glad to send you the upcoming FIELD TRIPS!!! Today,
it's Baseball 1830's style at the Nathan Boone State Historic Site at 3pm, FREE
and refreshments served. We're exploring the rules, and using authentic
equipment, ect, and than actually playing the game. The event lasts about 3 hours.

Let's see, my daughter has decided to really cook up a storm today,
blackberry pie, blueberry pie, strawberry pie, I'm beginning to like this cooking
trend.

Pam in Mo


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
